text: they've packed the little they have and
set off a few with their families but
mostly these are men who came to Mumbai
to earn a better life for their loved
ones in the cities they've helped build
stuck amidst the lockdown many have been
left to fend for themselves at least
we'll get food in our village Steve here
will die on just one morning in one city
we've seen hundreds on the road under
the Summer Sun 60 year old rom Dean
socket worked as a labourer with his
nephew I asked them why they aren't
waiting since the government has said it
will provide transport we've been
hearing these assurances for a long time
but nothing has undone everything is for
the wealthy no one thinks about us so we
have no option but to walk he says many
have been thrown out of the rooms they
lived in because they can't afford rent
these are people who've already walked
miles to the outskirts of the city
hoping they find some means
transport back to their villages homes
there are more than a thousand
kilometers away after more than 60 days
of lockdown their tolerance is broken
India has always struggled with
inequality for in our memory it's
perhaps never been a stock as visible as
it is right now the journey home is
often perilous dozens have died along
the way
among them 12-year old John Lowe Mikami
she worked on Chile farms not far from
her home in this tribal village in
central India she collapsed after
walking for three days Tara came I think
of her so much especially when I see the
girls she used to play with she was my
favorite her mother says last week the
government started special trains for
migrant laborers so far more than
650,000 have gone back home
but there are at least 14 million such
workers in India and many feel they
simply cannot wait any longer
in some parts of the country tensions
arising this is surat in western india
the Prime Minister has announced an aid
package which he says will help the poor
for those waiting and walking on India's
roads few details yet of what that means
for them yoga dalam a BBC News Mumbai
